GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.15.46
GSD.description:
mtd: rawnand: cadence: fix possible null-ptr-deref in cadence_nand_dt_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit 0cfee868b89ffa945f3d535ee5c985cb40c5a0f8, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit ec4ba01e894d3165e4d1ccbef782ef5593b708b4. For more details please see the references link.
